author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jolywood Suzhou Sunwatt to pay cash dividend on April 19
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Jolywood Suzhou Sunwatt Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 5.010571 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 18
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 19 and the dividend will be paid on April 19
